title: Can't reconnect!!!!!!!!!
body: I just got into a game, then out of no where my client exited and when i relogged it said i still had a match, but whenever i clicked it I coulnt get back into the game, any help?

replies.body:
This has been a problem for me aswell. I use Optus and normally what I would do is exit League and log back in and reconnect.

Hasn't failed me since, but got alot of low priority queue for it ;_;
What OS are you on, and who's your ISP?
